long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension helps to automate your network management in a professional setting. With Braice you will be able to create separate lists from your Linkedin contacts by certain keywords, easily share those lists and allow the receiving party to request an introduction with the members of the list. The Braice smart search will allow you to filter your contacts effortlessly. The system turns your network from a passive list of contacts into an active community. With Bracie, utilizing, growing and sharing your professional network is easy! If you are in a communication-heavy, high-power network position (HR, VC, Recruiter etc.), Braice is a great fit for you!
